doc:
Margaret Wright (actress) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Margaret_Wright_(actress) 0 Margaret Wright (January 11, 1917 – August 20, 1999) was an American movie actress. She provided the voice of Casey Junior in Dumbo with the use of a Sonovox, and after her death Casey Junior's voice was succeeded by Cathy Cavadini in all later Dumbo projects. She appeared as herself on Disneyland and The Life and Times of Rosie the Riveter, and Margaret Wright starred in I'll Be Home for Christmas as Mary Jenkins in 1998. She died in 1999 of a heart failure, aged 82. Margaret_Wright ( January_11_,_1917 – August_20_,_1999 ) was an_American_movie_actress . She provided the_voice of Casey_Junior in Dumbo with the_use of a_Sonovox , and after her_death_Casey_Junior 's_voice was_succeeded by Cathy_Cavadini in all_later_Dumbo_projects . She appeared as herself on Disneyland and The_Life_and_Times of Rosie the_Riveter , and Margaret_Wright starred in I 'll_Be Home for Christmas as Mary_Jenkins in 1998 . She died in 1999 of a_heart_failure , aged_82 .
